ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Galileo - PWS - magnetic field : high resolution
ResourceHeader.AlternateName: Magnetic field spectral density : high resolution
ResourceHeader.Description:
This data set includes high resolution data of the             
                         magnetic wave spectra obtained during the period that the Galileo         
                         plasma wave receiver was operated during the Jupiter orbital              
                         mission (prime, GEM and GMM).
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement:
When using this data please acknowledge the PI Donald A. Gurnett and Co-I William S. Kurth, NASA,
                the PDS and the VMO.

See the Rules of the road at https://amda.cdpp.eu/help/policy.html . Please acknowledge the Data Providers.
